title: Yuri Gordon
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Yuri Gordon**

Yuri Gordon (Юрий Гордон) is a [Russian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Russia) designer and author of « [Книга про буквы от Аа до Яя](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005010/http:/store.artlebedev.com/catalog/books/design/kniga_pro_bykvy/)» ( _[Book of Letters From Аа to Яя](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Book%20of%20Letters%20From%20%D0%90%D0%B0%20to%20%D0%AF%D1%8F)_. Yuri is also principal of the Moscow-based [Letterhead Studio](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letterhead%20Studio).

**Additional Articles:**  
 [Paratype Designer Bio: Yuri Gordon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005010/http:/www.paratype.com/help/designers/designer.asp?code=AD_GY)
author: paul d hunt
